description: Cold-weather days call for reliable protection. The Men’s Alpine Polartec® 200 ¼-Zip has a flexible four-way stretch, hem adjustability and a water-repellent overlay. As one of our Circular Design styles, it’s made with sustainably-conscious materials and recyclable when you get it back to us.
name: The North Face Alpine Polartec 200 1/4 Zip - Mens
